protein.specific_function: Displays arylsulfatase activity at neutral pH, when co- expressed with SUMF1; arylsulfatase activity is measured in the secretion medium of retinal cell line, but no activity is recorded when measured in cell extracts

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds

reference.reference_text: Sardiello M, Annunziata I, Roma G, Ballabio A: Sulfatases and sulfatase modifying factors: an exclusive and promiscuous relationship. Hum Mol Genet. 2005 Nov 1;14(21):3203-17. Epub 2005 Sep 20.
Obaya AJ: Molecular cloning and initial characterization of three novel human sulfatases. Gene. 2006 May 10;372:110-7. Epub 2006 Feb 24.

Oshikawa M, Usami R, Kato S: Characterization of the arylsulfatase I (ARSI) gene preferentially expressed in the human retinal pigment epithelium cell line ARPE-19. Mol Vis. 2009;15:482-94. Epub 2009 Mar 6.
